pageContext._xxxcollectionDescriptionxtxt: Twelve scripts for Neighbors: A Story of the Air, an adaptation for radio by Zona Gale and Marian de Forest of Zona Gale's "Friendship Village" that were aired over WEAF (NBC), between February 24 and May 29, 1933. Also includes correspondence between Gale and de Forest about the Neighbors series and an outline of the series.
